pullrequest.title: Contact changes for mud performance improvement

content.raw: I would suggest writing a performance test (similar to transport_stress and factory_stress) that drops a bunch of stuff into a collide_without_contact box and checks for a reduction in real-time factor. I'll give it a shot while testing this pull request and ticket it if I don't come up with something reasonably quickly.
content.html: I would suggest writing a performance test (similar to transport_stress and factory_stress) that drops a bunch of stuff into a collide_without_contact box and checks for a reduction in real-time factor. I'll give it a shot while testing this pull request and ticket it if I don't come up with something reasonably quickly.
